description:
A small functional reactive programming lib for JavaScript.

Turns your event spaghetti into clean and declarative feng shui ponyfood, by switching from imperative to functional. It's like replacing nested for-loops with functional programming concepts like map and filter. Stop working on individual events and work with event streams instead. Combine your data with merge and combine. Then switch to the heavier weapons and wield flatMap and combineTemplate like a boss.

It's the _ of Events. Too bad the symbol ~ is not allowed in JavaScript.
name: ponyfood.js
